website_summaries.verdict: By far one of the most popular sand art kits available for purchase – this inclusive model is sure to impress.
pros: Includes 4 sand bottles and 2 pendant bottles
Comes with extra sand for additional use
Satin cord can be used for making a necklace
Plastic funnel keeps sand in place
cons: Many customers had issues with the box arriving slightly damaged or with missing pieces

customer_reviews.title: Everything NOT included - don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: The package was incredibly incomplete. ITEMS THAT ARE SUPPOSED TO BE INCLUDED: 4 sand bottles, 2 pendant botteles, 8 bags of sand, 1 satin cord, 1 plastic funnel, 1 design tool and instructions. WHAT WE GOT: 6 bags of sand with holes throughout bags. NOT 8 1 pendant bottle NOT 2 4 sand bottles THE ONLY COMPLETE PART OF THE ORDER NO SATIN CORD NO PLASTIC FUNNEL NO DESIGN TOOL NO INSTRUCTIONS. Avoid this product from horizon group
customer_reviews.author: KTD

customer_reviews.title: My son loved the sand art!
customer_reviews.text: Did this with my 5 year old son tonight and we both had a lot of fun! Very easy to do and sparks creativity. We used paper from large pad (not included) to place our work on. You can also make a couple of necklaces. Great project for making gifts too!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This was a fun activity for my grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun activity for my grandchildren, but one of the bags of sand was open so the entire inside of the box was full of pink sand!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great Set For All Ages (well not babies/toddlers obviously!)
customer_reviews.text: Under ten bucks and so much fun! My kids really enjoyed making the sand art, choosing their colors and having the momentos. There are two necklace charms (Star and Heart) and then a combination of different shaped bottles. I have littles and teens so this was an activity they could do together and all enjoyed. My note would be to cut open all the colors and line them up in the box top to keep them upright - if they spill it goes everywhere. Only one funnel so they had to do it together and take turns holding the funnel and the bottle and working together. Super pretty finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Lilo

customer_reviews.title: It was a great activity with the help of the parents
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as an activity for my children’s birthday party (age group 3-5 years old). It was a great activity with the help of the parents, and the kids loved doing it. My only complaint is that most of the bottles were stained upon opening. It wasn’t a huge deal since it’s not really noticeable once the sand is added and this project was for toddlers, but still aggravating that we got damaged products nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Duvall

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun but missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for a gift so I’m really hoping that one has all its pieces. I purchased one for my child and the lightbulb looking bottle has a lid with a hole in it so not really sure how to keep sand in that bottle if it were to get knocked over. That’s crazy it is a kid with a hole in too. Also we are missing a lid to another bottle. Overall my child is having fun with it but she was pretty bummed that she won’t be able to make two of the bottles though due to no lid for one and hole in lid for other bottle. I will not buy this sand art kid again.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie G

customer_reviews.title: Of All the Kits, this One Works
customer_reviews.text: I really do purchase a lot of creative/interactive kits for my kiddo and I to try together. I was a little worried my young son would have some difficulty with this kit...that he wouldn't be able to get the sand so distinctly layered, leaving him frustrated or defeated. That wasn't the case at all! Yes, sand is messy...so prepare for that. With a proper set-up and assistance, my four year old did all but one of the bottles by himself, and all of them looked like they could have come from the front cover. I'd buy this again and even gift it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson and I had fun making things for others to have. The necklaces and bottles are pretty when done. Special because they are easy to make and creative play for young people.
customer_reviews.author: Fleurie

customer_reviews.title: THE KIDS WILL LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Comes with everything the children will need to be creative without making a huge mess. Great for little artist
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Crafternoon
customer_reviews.text: Made a great birthday gift. I'm taking a star off because the bottom of the gift bag was full of green sand prior to her ever opening the box. I didn't notice it was defective before wrapping it. This is the 2nd one I bought and the 1st was fine so it was likely a fluke. Otherwise, great little craft.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Cook

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun project
customer_reviews.text: I remember making these at the county fair when I was young. I bought this for a craft for my four year old son. He had a ball creating different patterns. I got a plate for each bag of sand, so there was very little mess. We tampered down the bottles to help the sand settle while adding additional layers. There are several different kinds of bottles, two of which can be worn as a necklace. Keep the extra sand when the sand settles after a few weeks, you can top off so the sand doesn't mix. Fun for gift giving or for a craft during a rainy day or during a pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Prudence Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected but I didn't read the the specs. This kit is for making sand bottle necklaces and tiny bottles. The adage is true. Nothing is like it used to be. I remember doing this as a kid with much bigger bottles so I didn't think I needed to look. The cherry on top of the cake was that one of the bottles had a hole in it which we found out after we filled it in and sand started pouring from the bottom. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Starry Pluto

customer_reviews.title: I’m angry
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and there was blue sand everywhere. So I open up the sand kit and that explodes with more sand. The package was already open, and taped together with scotch tape. The light blue and dark blue sand packages were cut open and empty because the sand was all over the box it was packaged in/shipped in.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 year old enjoyed an afternoon of building the sand art project and was very careful with the different colors of sand. This project allows your child to be as creative or as meticulous as they choose to be in making the project. Could be a bit messy if they aren't careful, so this project may be good outdoors, or at least with a huge table cloth to catch any errant sand that doesn't make it into the plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Sportsman

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity for preschool or early elementary kids
customer_reviews.text: Two of the bottles were super scratched up, but certainly not worth returning; they’re pretty flimsy quality but shouldn’t really matter if they’re just sitting on display once made. Came with enough sand to fill the bottles and have some spilling accidents, fun and vibrant colors. My 4-year old son loved the activity and thought it was cool that there were different shapes to do. A little spoon would have been nice to include to offer some control rather than just expecting kids to pour the bags into the funnel. We poured the sand out into a muffin tin and used a baby spoon to scoop into the funnel.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Hooks Only Fit 3-4 Suncatchers
customer_reviews.text: It is nice the paint is in tubes instead of a pallet. The suncatchers are very cute. It is a good price for the set, but the BIG issue is that the hooks do not fit 90% of the suncatchers. The picture on the box shows all of them hanging by the hooks/suction cups that come with the set, but it doesn't show the fishing line in the box for ALL the suncatchers that will not fit on the hooks...very disappointing and misleading. Hooks are too big for the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Yarboro

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's loved making these
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's (4&6) thoroughly enjoyed doing these. I did help the entire time because of the possible mess, but worth it! They now have then displayed proudly in their room and around their necks. I would recommend tapping the viles as you fill them with sand so if they are moved around the colors stay in tact. I would also recommend adding some glue to the tops once you are finished so they stay secure.
customer_reviews.author: Katlin

customer_reviews.title: No Racing Now
customer_reviews.text: Great project for the Pandemic Homeschool Quarantine, when kids actually have time to enjoy doing projects without having to race to do more school work or race to go to bed so they can get up the next morning to race off to school and then race home and race to do homework and race to eat supper and race to get their baths so they can race to bed, only to get up the next morning to start the racing all over again!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces and sand
customer_reviews.text: This was great and we were having fun until I realized we were not given the glow sand and were also missing three of the big swirly looking bottles! My daughter was very upset as this was a birthday present. I can't send it back as it was a birthday gift and the time to send back has way passed, but it would be nice if we were at least able to be given the pieces that were missing since I paid $20 for this.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyAndHusband

customer_reviews.title: Cute sand kit, but missing parts
customer_reviews.text: We finally got around to using this sand kit, which I gave my daughter for Christmas. The bottles are cute and there is plenty of sand, but we were very disappointed to find that one of the bottles is missing a plug, reducing the number of usable bottles from 6 to 5. In looking more carefully at other reviews, it seems that incomplete packages are not uncommon.
customer_reviews.author: Prime addict

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good gift for a child
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandchildren to have something to do while stuck at home and they quickly filled up the provided vials, which are plastic, on the first day. My grandson made me a heart-shaped necklace. If you have more than one child I recommend buying them each their own box or get a bigger set.
customer_reviews.author: Tory Richards

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this as a gift for Christmas. As soon as my 8 yr old saw it, she also wanted one. Ended up buying another one and to this day (Sept 2020) the sand art are still sitting in my window sill. My daughter really enjoyed creating them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Opossum Food
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt appear that anything inside of the box is damaged from what I could tell but the sand art box itself looks as if a wild opossum may have helped put it together and mistaken it for last weeks trash. The box has holes in it & has several tears. I cannot possibly wrap it as a Christmas gift so I will now figure something else out with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift 🎁 and my seven and nine year old granddaughters loved it. The four-year-old granddaughter was just too young to do it. The only problem I had was seen the frustration on the girls faces when they were trying to do fancy designs With that long stick thing is supposed to go down the side of what you’re making.
customer_reviews.author: Mynning

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten this kit 3 times for my nephews, 4 & 5, who love doing sand art! This set is nice because it has the yellow plastic tops unlike other sets where you must use hot wax. Also others have mentioned running out of sand after 4 bottles but I’ve never had that problem and it’s not due to very precise pouring lol. This is a very fun project for kids and Grandma ended up loving it too.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Bright colored sand
customer_reviews.text: Lots of beautiful colorful sand and hours of fun with this one. Plenty of sand so don’t worry. The shooting star is tricky to fill as we had trouble getting it to stand on its own. All others were great. Did this with grandkids age 9-12 and all loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma K

customer_reviews.title: A decent value
customer_reviews.text: Kinda cheesey. The bottles Ave very light weight and tip over easy..... Add that to the fact the sand settles by the next day, so your left with a bunch of mixed colors at the top. Kids didn't care though. They still enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: A.Mom

customer_reviews.title: They look great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 11yr old daughter and she really liked it. You get exactly what is shown on the box. They look pretty good when they are done and we won't need to worry about 1 of these breaking since they are plastic. The tops on the plastic vases seem a bit loose so you may want to tape or glue them shut just in case 1 gets knocked over, that way you don't have sand everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Beeswax

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The plastic bottles in this craft are very thin and cheap. For the money I spent I would expect more. The yellow plugs for the top barely stay to secure the sand. My son had fun pouring the sand. It was just okay. I wouldn’t buy again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Guest

customer_reviews.title: Throw back fun
customer_reviews.text: I loved doing sand art as a kid, so when i saw this kit I had to buy it. The kids and I had so much fun create sandy works of art. My only complaint would be that it would be nice if they imcluded more than one of the tiny funnels.
customer_reviews.author: QueenShaybay

customer_reviews.title: Totally smashed box
customer_reviews.text: Item box was totally smashed on every side ! The box it was shipped in was perfect no dents, so the damage to the product was done before shipping - Bought as a gift so I have no idea (yet) what the contents look like - Disappointing, I had no time to request a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but...
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the bottles were dented in and you can't really 'undent' them. Didn't stop my daughter from liking them. I used super glue on the tops to make sure they stayed closed when she played with them later since the top comes out very easily and sand would be everywhere. But she had fun putting them together!
customer_reviews.author: jro

customer_reviews.title: makes great gifts from a child to adults
customer_reviews.text: got this for grandson to make gifts for all the adult ladies in his life for Christmas. He enjoyed it (4 years old) and it made gifts for 4 ladies. We assembled them at the park so any mess from the sand was not a problem and it was easy enough for us to do together. Would buy this again. Just be sure when you are done that you have super glue for the tops, you really want to glue these down good.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fun Rainy Day Activity!
customer_reviews.text: My son had been asking for a sand art kit ever since his sister had one. I bought him this for his 5th birthday. We've already done four and we had a lot of fun! He needs a little help with it - I hold the bottle while he pours the sand. The sand colors are vibrant. The sand pours easily and makes wonderful designs.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended at all
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended at all. The little sand bag, you can’t close them if you don’t want to use the all bag. And we just use it now and 2 minutes later it breaks and make a mess all over . Very disappointed. I wish I can return it
customer_reviews.author: Asaf

customer_reviews.title: Not enough sand
customer_reviews.text: The product was supposed to contain 8 different colors of sand but instead I received 2 packets of yellow. The total amount of sand was not sufficient to fill all plastic containers even though the containers were small. Aside from the above comments the set was enjoyable for kids
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun family activity
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed creating these as a family. It was fun seeing what creative designs everyone chose. One thing we didn’t realize is that the sand kept settling. We filled up at first but it settled more and we didn’t know that would keep happening. We did have leftover sand we could have used to top off.
customer_reviews.author: YoungFam

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The colors of the sand are rather ugly compared to the ones they show online- and no, it has nothing to do with screen brightness. It’s a very underwhelming sand art kit, my artistic and creative 6 year old wasn’t amused one bit.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sand without a trip to the beach.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the time I spent with my grandson layering the different colors of sand. At 5 he isn't ready to do designs but no matter to him. He liked it just as we used it. The bear bottle and had dents which I was able to punch out , but not completely.
customer_reviews.author: JY. Roach

customer_reviews.title: Missing items , disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed... no funnel, missing sand, missing bottles ... etc! this is crazy buying a product that isn’t complete !! I see we are not the only ones with the same review , very disappointing Xmas present to my child!
customer_reviews.author: Quinnde1

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: As a child I loved sand art, so I was hoping to share the fun experience in making these with a child for a birthday. Unfortunately when I received the package the box was taped like it had been opened before and pink sand was spilling out. With this being said, I had to get another gift for the little girl as I would have been too embarrassed to give this to her as a birthday gift. I will give 2 stars because the other sand was closed and not spilling out and the plastic containers were included.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Come As Stated - Only Received 4 Bottles Not 6
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas. We opened the box and where disappointed to see that there are only 4 bottles in this product even though the packaging clearly states that there are supposed to be 6. We even received the cord for the hanging bottles but the bottles themselves where nowhere in sight. If it weren't for the 2 missing bottles, this product would have been perfect. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Evonne Salomon

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr. old and 6 yr. old Grandkids both enjoyed making these. We did it outside and put all the different colored sand in muffin tins. They were so proud to take them home and give them to their parents. I enjoyed just watching them be creative.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: so much fun
customer_reviews.text: Despite reading some of the bad reviews, I took a chance and purchased this. It arrived in one piece, nothing broken. My 8yr old granddaughter and I had a great time. I wish the bags were resealable, but I guess if I had snack bags I could pour the remain sand into them. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: GRETCHEN SCHMEISSER

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it - Parents will have to love Cleaning Up!
customer_reviews.text: As the title says... protect the area that you work on these crafts! The kids loved doing it, and I’d agree that they turned out pretty awesome. However, my littlest probably needs more help than I gave her and I ultimately paid the price by having to clean the entire mess 🤔
customer_reviews.author: JRA

customer_reviews.title: Great craft, but not a complete package
customer_reviews.text: My kids were so excited to make this craft. The sand colors were great: many to choose from. We only negative was there was a topper that was excluded from the box, so we were only able to make 5 crafts vs 6.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Stow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome art
customer_reviews.text: all the required and listed items were there. perfectly well packed. instructions are great. I did it with 4 year old and a 5year old. Both loved it and were able to do it themselves. the end result looks great. highly recommend it as an activity to do with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Merinda

customer_reviews.title: Great Activity
customer_reviews.text: Great for entertaining at home. Used to make this sand creations as a kid and was a good trip down memory lane. Simple, easy and fun with a few glasses of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It's okay..
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this was fun for about 30 minutes. After the bottles are filled with sand, there's nothing more to it. It looks good as decor but then what else is there? We threw it out after a few days... there's better activities out there..
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Parts are missing
customer_reviews.text: it is a great collection of bottles and sand but many of the white covers/plugs were missing so my grandchildren cold not complete their projects
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun with this activity. We sat at our table, set up our supplies (which were all included) took turns filling our bottles with sand, while listening to music, talking and bonding. We all enjoyed it and it was something fun and different to do. Product was just as described.
customer_reviews.author: JAMEN

customer_reviews.title: Sand Art
customer_reviews.text: The set looks just like the picture. The sand is individually bagged. My grandson enjoyed making the sand art. He did need help pouring the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Item came opened and looks used
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a brand new item and the box is opened and taped and two sand bags were open and all the sand had spilled all over the box. Very disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: JustsayJulesstyle

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: There was plenty of sand but the containers were pretty flimsy and cheap. Buy another funnel b/c you will need more than one. The kids had fun doing it so that was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: skyeeeo

customer_reviews.title: Had fun with my grandsons making these
customer_reviews.text: Had fun with my grandsons making these. They are cheap plastic so don't plan on keeping the product long term, but still fun to do.
customer_reviews.author: Irish

customer_reviews.title: This was fun
customer_reviews.text: This was fun activity for our guests on BD party of my son (he is 4yo). Kids smaller and bigger loved it and the fact that they will take it home made them even happier. I purchase this set second time and it was still the hit.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old loved this. yes, it can get messy! we used a cookie sheet to contain (most of) the mess. 4 stars simply because we are missing 1 bottle "stopper"...we still used the bottle, now we just need to think of a way to seal it (annoying). plenty of sand included.
customer_reviews.author: gf

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Product missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all. We did 3 of the plastic bottles and went to put lids on and they shorted us 2 lids and the lid for the necklace.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gift to creat and share.
customer_reviews.text: Another gift during the corona virus to my four year old grandaughter. She was able to do this with supervision and loved the process and end results. She said she was going to give it to her friends that she was missing real bad.
customer_reviews.author: Vonda Piersol

customer_reviews.title: Good value, lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Good quantity of sand and the colors are vibrant. Bottles and caps are good. The only things that bother me are the bags in which the sand is packaged (not resealable) and the push-stick is way too wide to be useful. But it's cheap and the kids had a blast playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Harmed by laundry pods

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for kids all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great arts and crafting for snowy or rainy day or any day ! It's easy to do Kids young and old love it! Easy set up for quick fun. Great gift idea when your unsure what to buy a younger or older kid. I highly recommend this 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: SAVY BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for our 5 year old daughter. It's easy to use, and she loves it. The colors are cute and so are the containers. Definitely an awesome gift.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Good creative fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old granddaughter for Xmas but she was at my house one day and we got bored so I took it out and we played together and used it all. It was quite easy to do and she had no problem doing it herself with no help from me. We had a good time and she gave one of the necklaces to her best friend at school.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Kids love Sand!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great activity if you dont mind your kitchen floor getting a little sandy. Kids love sand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems to be good
customer_reviews.text: after reading some reviews about missing pieces or sand, i checked my box and it all seems intact. this is a Christmas present (I plan waaaay ahead) so i wanted to make sure it was all there before i missed the return window. lucky for me, all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Racquelle

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is five and had a blast making these and is very proud of them. The sand colors are bright and pretty and I also did not realize it came with two necklace bottles when I ordered it. The caps screw on tight and it comes with bright thick rainbow colored string. Very cute and fun set.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fun and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun craft for my 5 and 8 year old girls. I like that the jars are plastic, not glass, and that the lids fasten securely. I also like the variety and brightness of the sand colors. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Miller

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and I had a blast doing this together! I'm really glad I found it and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: My girls ages 3 and 4 really liked this set. Also there are 2 of each color so I could split it up between them. Plenty of sand and lots of colors and glitter to choose from. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amin Haidar

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for kids. I got this for my daughter for Christmas and it has provided hours of entertainment. You can also add your own bottles since the set doesn’t come with that many, but it does come with plenty of sand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the kids. They each made one and haven't used it since, but it's a great item if your kids are into this type of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sapost

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: 1 bag of sand was leaking when I opened the shipping box. I exchanged for a new one and this time all the colors weren't in there.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Curtis

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wishes the plastic containers were smaller so she could make more, she was disappointed. She was happy with the ones she was able to make though.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Marin

customer_reviews.title: this kit was really fun. My two year old and four year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This product came and one of the bags of sand had opened and gotten into everything else in my order. I had yellow sand everywhere. That being said, this kit was really fun. My two year old and four year old both loved it. I would have given it five stars if it had come intact.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moeller

customer_reviews.title: nice kit, small children need assistance but can be done
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 5 year old granddaughter, she did need help from Mom
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids love doing sand art. The colors or sand and shapes of containers in this set have been really fun for them. I’ve had ones in the past that you used glue to seal it, but this has a cap that snaps on.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Busenlehner

customer_reviews.title: Making memories
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my kids for a craft but our whole family enjoyed making one. Brought back childhood memories from my youth.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Its fun.
customer_reviews.text: Funnel needs to be wider for quicker fill. One of the bottles was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very creative and ornamental. You can explore patterns and give as personal gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine motor skills development
customer_reviews.text: My special needs son uses this in art class and loves it. Excellent for developing motor skills and experimenting with colors.
customer_reviews.author: I. Burshteyn

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: The bag of purple sand was cut, so there was sand everywhere...in the shipping box, in the actual box, all over the tape, as well as anywhere I’d set the box down. Product itself seems fine but more care should be taken when packaging the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lots of missing parts
customer_reviews.text: No funnel, sand not complete, came with smashed bottles - seller did not fix.
customer_reviews.author: Nut Lover

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was so much fun for my 5 year old daughter! We have one to all the aunts in the family!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Super fun craft!!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a fun craft and they were a hit. I had these growing up and they are as fun as I remember😉 would suggest more than one funnel but no other complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gausepohl

customer_reviews.title: Missing funnel
customer_reviews.text: If the funnel is missing you cannot do this craft because the top bottle openings are very small. I had purchased this previously and had a great time with the first kit with my grand children. Its not worth the hassle of sending it back for a refund or another kit. I'm sorry that I cannot order this product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Broken piece in box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 granddaughters. They love creating colorful patterns. Unfortunately, the package was delivered with 1 of the bottles broken at the bottom. They are only made of plastic so anything can cause them to easily break. Since it was the only activity for a rainy afternoon they went ahead and used the other ones. Packaging needs to be better to protect these fragile bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Polly B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: When i saw it online i like it , but when i got it both product and box are damaged. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheetal

customer_reviews.title: Good craft project for 9 yr old
customer_reviews.text: 9 yr old easily made several of the plastic bottles with colored sand included. Plan to cover your surface for play or ecpect to clean up some spilled sand.
customer_reviews.author: Ms K

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money, but was missing item.
customer_reviews.text: It was missing one of the bottles. Other than that it is a decent product for the price. I could tell it had been opened and taped shut.
customer_reviews.author: SLJackson

customer_reviews.title: This was a fun project for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun project for my 4 year old. I'm just scared of the caps coming off. I think you would need to add a drop of super glue to feel safe with your child actually carrying this around!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea. I little messy but my daughter enjoyed making these!
customer_reviews.author: Lau

customer_reviews.title: Nice for older kids
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice activity to do but really messy! And not for a house with little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Fun little activity!
customer_reviews.text: We had fun doing these over Christmas break! There are 6 total so each kiddo got to do 3 and they were happy with that. There was plenty of sand to finish each one.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Great for Grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, perfectly packaged. This was a great activity for my 6 and 8 year old granddaughters to do with me - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: RhondaDonda

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nine-year-old niece and she loves it! We made a couple together and she did some on her own and she loves what she creates with them
customer_reviews.author: Fleur

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy bottles
customer_reviews.text: The kids had fun making these, but the bottles are absolute junk. Super thin plastic and while filling them the sand dust gets trapped on either uneven surface or some sort of residue in the bottles and creates a clouding effect.
customer_reviews.author: Charity W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: It was a fun activity for my three kids, 7, 4, and 2. They later used the bottles with their water table.
customer_reviews.author: KLsc

customer_reviews.title: Ripped sand bags.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box a couple of the bags were ripped. I continued to make the sand art with my 3 year old because she was really excited otherwise I would have sent it back and requested a new one. I’m not sure we’ll have enough sand to finish filling the containers. Overall it’s a cute project but would have liked if we got non ripped bags. 5 stars if the bags weren’t ripped.
customer_reviews.author: MEO Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great set and value!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old son! He loves sand art. We have bought different sets from different brands and price ranges. This one is the best and great value! He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Kot

customer_reviews.title: Love sandart.
customer_reviews.text: The purple was open, so I lost most of that color, but, other wise product as expected
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Scott

product_meta.title: Made By Me Create Your Own Sand Art by Horizon Group Usa, DIY Kit Includes 4 Sand Bottles & 2 Pendent Bottles with 8 Bright Sand Colors, Designing Tool & More. Multicolored
product_meta.description:
Style:Sand Art| Design:Art KitCreate one-of-a-kind designs using sparkling and colorful sand with the Made By Me sand art kit! Display cool color schemes as you learn fun layering techniques that add flair to your rooms decor. Fill up fun shaped sand bottles for a playful decoration or personalized gifts for your family and friends. This Super fun activity allows you to organize color schemes, play with fun shapes and discover art through different art mediums. Recommended for ages 6 and up.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Includes everything you need to make colorful Sand Art. 5 Sand Bottles, 2 Pendant Bottles, 8 Colors of Sand (3.5 oz each), Satin Cord (1.5yd), 1 Plastic Funnel, Design Tool, Easy-to-Follow Instructions.
feature_bullets: Create cool designs: learn how to layer colorful patterns to create one-of-a-kind designs
Fun intro into different medias of art: express yourself and discover art through different art mediums
Display with flair: fill fun shaped sand bottles with playful decorations and to create personalized gifts
Kit includes: 4 sand bottles, 2 pendant bottles, 8 colors of sand, 1 satin cord, 1 plastic funnel, 1 design tool, easy-to-follow instructions

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
